apply manifest.yaml
sleep 10s
vty show running-config | section "interface loopback0"
cmp stdout running-config.txt

-- manifest.yaml --
apiVersion: networking.cloud.sap/v1alpha1
kind: Interface
metadata:
  name: lo0
spec:
  name: lo0
  description: Router-ID Leaf1
  adminState: Up
  type: Loopback
  mtu: 1500
  ipv4:
    addresses:
      - 10.0.0.10/32

-- running-config.txt --
interface loopback0
  description Router-ID Leaf1
  ip address 10.0.0.10/32
